item.title: Build
item.description: The required build environment for krei is described in dev-env. In case you have Java and Maven locally installed call: # run all tests $ mvn verify # install locally $ mvn install # open jshell $ mvn --projects krei-metio --also-make --activate-profiles jshell test In case you are using ilo call this: # build the project $ ilo @build/once # open a shell with a pre-defined build environment $ ilo @build/shell In case you want to build the website do this:
